editorialNotes.standard: Those clues in crossword puzzles…they always stump us. If that’s you, you’ll love how Wordalot reinvents the concept by presenting clues as colourful photos packed with everything from musical instruments to cake. Somehow, staring at images to figure out that “guitar” and “birthday” solve the puzzle is way more fun and satisfying than deciphering an old-school crossword.
